name: RTCPeerConnection.iceGatheringState
description: The read-only property RTCPeerConnection.iceGatheringState returns an enum of type RTCIceGatheringState that describes connection's ICE gathering state. This lets you detect, for example, when collection of ICE candidates has finished.

refs.name: WebRTC 1.0: Real-time Communication Between Browsers
refs.description: The definition of 'RTCPeerConnection.iceGatheringState' in the 'WebRTC 1.0: Real-time Communication Between Browsers' specification.
